Berlenti Abdel Hamid, a mụrụ Nefisa Abdel-Hamid Hawass, bụ ihe ngosi nke oge ọlaedo nke ihe nkiri Egypt. A maara ya maka ọrụ ya dị ka "onye nnupụisi". Ọ lụrụ Abdel Hakim Amer, osote onye isi ala mbụ nke onye bụbu onye isi ala Ijipt Gamal Abdel Nasser.
Abdel Hamid nwụrụ n'ụlọ ọgwụ ndị agha mgbe ọ nwesịrị ọrịa strok.
